mapper.select:
SELECT od2.od_goodscount, od2.pr_price*od2.od_goodscount as pr_totalprice, od2.pro_size, od2.pr_name, od2.pr_price, od2.pro_color, od2.od_num FROM sc_order o LEFT join (select * from (SELECT od.od_goodscount, p.pro_size,od.pro_num, p.pro_color,p.pr_num, od.order_num, od.od_num from sc_order_detail od right join product p on od.pro_num = p.pro_num) p1 left join (select DISTINCT p.pr_num, pd.pr_name, pd.pr_price from product p left join pr_detail pd on p.pr_num = pd.pr_num) p2 on p1.pr_num = p2.pr_num) od2 on o.order_num=od2.order_num
where o.order_num = #{order_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sc_order WHERE order_deliverydate < to_date(sysdate)-7
mapper.select: select od.od_num, od.order_state, od.order_num, p.pr_price, od.od_goodscount, od.pro_num, p.pro_size, p.pr_num, p.pro_color, p.pr_name from (select o1.order_num, o2.od_num, o1.order_state, o2.pro_num, o2.od_goodscount from sc_order o1 join sc_order_detail o2 on o1.order_num=o2.order_num) od join (select p1.pro_num, p1.pro_size, p1.pr_num, p1.pro_color, p2.pr_name, p2.pr_price from product p1 join pr_detail p2 on p1.pr_num=p2.pr_num) p on od.pro_num = p.pro_num where od_num = #{od_num}
select DISTINCT pro_color from product p join pr_detail pd on p.pr_num = pd.pr_num where p.pr_num=#{pr_num} and pd.pr_issale='Y'
select DISTINCT pro_size from product p join pr_detail pd on p.pr_num = pd.pr_num where p.pr_num=#{pr_num} and pd.pr_issale='Y'
